description: Describes the what-if forecast export created using the  CreateWhatIfForecastExport operation. In addition to listing the properties provided in the CreateWhatIfForecastExport request, this operation lists the following properties:

parameters.name: WhatIfForecastExportArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the what-if forecast export that you are interested in.

nested_items.name: WhatIfForecastExportArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the what-if forecast export.

nested_items.name: WhatIfForecastExportName
nested_items.description: The name of the what-if forecast export.

nested_items.name: WhatIfForecastArns
nested_items.description: An array of Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) that represent all of the what-if forecasts exported in this resource.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Destination
nested_items.description: The destination for an export job. Provide an S3 path, an Identity and Access Management (IAM) role that allows Amazon Forecast to access the location, and an Key Management Service (KMS) key (optional).

nested_items.name: Path
nested_items.description: The path to an Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3) bucket or file(s) in an Amazon S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the Identity and Access Management (IAM) role that Amazon Forecast can assume to access the Amazon S3 bucket or files. If you provide a value for the KMSKeyArn key, the role must allow access to the key.

nested_items.name: KMSKeyArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an Key Management Service (KMS) key.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: If an error occurred, an informational message about the error.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the what-if forecast. States include:
ACTIVE.
CREATE_PENDING, CREATE_IN_PROGRESS, CREATE_FAILED.
CREATE_STOPPING, CREATE_STOPPED.
DELETE_PENDING, DELETE_IN_PROGRESS, DELETE_FAILED.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: When the what-if forecast export was created.

nested_items.name: EstimatedTimeRemainingInMinutes
nested_items.description: The approximate time remaining to complete the what-if forecast export, in minutes.

nested_items.name: LastModificationTime
nested_items.description: The last time the resource was modified. The timestamp depends on the status of the job:
CREATE_PENDING - The CreationTime.
CREATE_IN_PROGRESS - The current timestamp.
CREATE_STOPPING - The current timestamp.
CREATE_STOPPED - When the job stopped.
ACTIVE or CREATE_FAILED - When the job finished or failed.

nested_items.name: Format
nested_items.description: The format of the exported data, CSV or PARQUET.
